alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:53AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An area of moderate thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern White Pine County through 1115 AM PDT... At 1050 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of moderate thunderstorm near Great Basin National Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Brief moderate to heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief heavy rain could cause ponding of water on local roadways, causing slick driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Great Basin National Park, Shoshone, Baker, Connors Pass, Majors Place, Sacramento Pass including the junction on US Highway 93 and US Highway 6/50 in southern White Pine county. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
